statements: SELECT * FROM permits WHERE permit_id = 1;
SELECT facility_name, start_date FROM permits WHERE activity_type = 'Construction';
SELECT * FROM permits WHERE start_date >= '2022-01-01' AND end_date <= '2022-12-31';
SELECT COUNT(*) as total_permits FROM permits WHERE activity_type = 'Renovation';
SELECT facility_name, activity_type FROM permits WHERE start_date < '2022-08-15' ORDER BY facility_name DESC;
SELECT * FROM permits WHERE start_date = '2022-01-01' AND end_date = '2022-12-31';
SELECT permit_id, facility_name FROM permits WHERE activity_type = 'Construction' ORDER BY start_date DESC;
SELECT * FROM permits WHERE facility_name LIKE '%Hospital%' AND activity_type <> 'Event' ORDER BY end_date ASC;
SELECT permit_id, start_date, end_date FROM permits WHERE facility_name IN ('School A', 'School B') AND activity_type = 'Education' ORDER BY start_date ASC, end_date DESC;
SELECT facility_name, COUNT(permit_id) AS total_permits FROM permits GROUP BY facility_name HAVING COUNT(permit_id) > 2 ORDER BY total_permits DESC;
SELECT * FROM permits WHERE facility_id = 1;
SELECT permit_id, activity_name FROM permits WHERE start_date >= '2022-01-01';
SELECT facility_name, location FROM facilities WHERE facility_id = 2;
SELECT permit_id, activity_name, start_date, end_date FROM permits WHERE facility_id = 3 ORDER BY start_date DESC;
SELECT activity_name FROM permits WHERE start_date < '2022-03-01' AND end_date > '2022-04-01';
SELECT * FROM permits WHERE facility_id = 1;
SELECT facility_id, activity_name, start_date, end_date FROM permits WHERE start_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-12-31';
SELECT facility_id, facility_name, location FROM facilities WHERE location LIKE '%city%';
SELECT activity_name, start_date, end_date, facility_name FROM permits p JOIN facilities f ON p.facility_id = f.facility_id;
SELECT permit_id, activity_name, start_date, end_date, facility_id, facility_name, location FROM permits JOIN facilities ON permits.facility_id = facilities.facility_id WHERE facility_id = 2;
SELECT * FROM permits
SELECT permit_id, issue_date, expiration_date FROM permits
SELECT facility_id, facility_name, location FROM facilities
SELECT activity_id, activity_name, activity_description FROM activities
SELECT permit_id, activity_type, issue_date, expiration_date FROM permits
SELECT * FROM permits WHERE activity_type = 'Construction' AND issue_date >= '2022-01-01';
SELECT facility_name, location FROM facilities WHERE facility_name LIKE '%Center%' ORDER BY location ASC;
SELECT activity_name, activity_description FROM activities JOIN permits ON activities.permit_id = permits.permit_id ORDER BY activities.activity_name DESC;
SELECT activity_name, location FROM activities JOIN facilities ON activities.facility_id = facilities.facility_id WHERE activities.activity_name IN ('Camping', 'Swimming') ORDER BY location DESC;

SELECT facilities.facility_name, permits.issue_date, permits.expiration_date FROM facilities JOIN permits ON facilities.facility_id = permits.facility_id WHERE permits.issue_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-06-30';
SELECT * FROM permits;
SELECT facility_name, activity_type FROM permits ORDER BY issue_date DESC;
SELECT facility_name, COUNT(*) FROM permits GROUP BY facility_name;
SELECT * FROM facilities WHERE facility_type = 'Restaurant';
SELECT facility_name, location FROM facilities WHERE facility_type = 'Office' ORDER BY facility_name;
SELECT * FROM permits WHERE permit_id = 1;
SELECT facility_name, location FROM facilities ORDER BY facility_name DESC;
SELECT activity_name, activity_date FROM activities WHERE permit_id = 3 ORDER BY activity_date ASC;
SELECT facility_name, facility_type, location FROM facilities WHERE location LIKE '%City%'
SELECT permit_id, activity_name, activity_notes FROM permit_activities WHERE permit_id = 2 ORDER BY activity_name ASC;
SELECT * FROM permits;
SELECT permit_id, activity_type, facility_name, start_date FROM permits WHERE facility_name='ABC Facility' ORDER BY start_date DESC;
SELECT location_name, city, state FROM locations WHERE state='California' ORDER BY city;
SELECT user_id, username, email, role FROM users WHERE role='Admin' ORDER BY username;
SELECT activity_id, activity_name, activity_description FROM activities WHERE activity_name LIKE '%Outdoor%' ORDER BY activity_id;
SELECT * FROM permits ORDER BY start_date DESC, facility_name;
SELECT facility_name, activity_type FROM permits WHERE activity_type = 'Construction' ORDER BY facility_name ASC;
SELECT location_name, city, state FROM locations WHERE state = 'California';
SELECT activity_name, activity_description FROM activities WHERE activity_description IS NOT NULL;
SELECT user_id, action, timestamp FROM history WHERE action = 'Login' ORDER BY timestamp DESC;
